oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Collection of Union and Confederate buttons
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The buttons include Confederate block "I" buttons, South Carolina, North Carolina, Virginia, Georgia, and Louisiana state seal buttons. The script "I" button was recovered from Germantown, Tennessee. Buttons of this type were made in England and imported by the Confederates. They were also found on uniforms made in England for the Confederate war effort. The small eagle with "I" was recovered from Trenton, Tennessee. The bullet was recovered from Shiloh.
